!title: Miso Fried Rice
!size: 2 portions
!author: Andreas Wallner
!lang: en

# 2 eggs
# 1tbs soy sauce
* make omlette, cut into strips

# 200g minced pork
* stir fry until dark

# 4 spring onions, thinly sliced
# 3 garlic cloves, minced
# 1cm ginger, minced
* stir fry with meat

# cooked rice
* stir fry with mixture
* remove from heat

# 1 1/2tbs brown miso
# 3tbs water
* mix
* mix under stir fry
* serve with omlette strips
